metaTags.description: View {{shopName}}'s digital store: get the digital goods you need instantly with our many payment gateways in just a few clicks, or get in touch with us should you need help.

metaTags.description: If you need help with a recent purchase, would like more information about a digital product we are offering or you're just curious about our solutions, do not hesitate to get in touch with us. It's as easy as filling in 3 inputs and clicking a button.

content.A designer knows he has achieved perfect: A designer knows he has achieved perfection not when there is nothing left to add, but when there is nothing left to take away.
content.Everything is designed. Few things are d: Everything is designed. Few things are designed well.
content.You can't use up creativity. The more yo: You can't use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
content.The public is more familiar with bad des: The public is more familiar with bad design than good design.
content.The function of design is letting design: The function of design is letting design function.
content.Design is a formal response to a strateg: Design is a formal response to a strategic question.
content.The alternative to good design is always: The alternative to good design is always bad design.
content.Design can be art. Design can be aesthet: Design can be art. Design can be aesthetics. Design is so simple, that's why it is so complicated.
content.Design is as much an act of spacing as a: Design is as much an act of spacing as an act of marking.
content.Every great design begins with an even b: Every great design begins with an even better story

items.answer: To get in touch with support after making a purchase, you can use the built-in ticketing system. Simply visit the contact page to submit your details and we will get back to you ASAP.
items.question: How can i get in touch with support after I bought the product?
Can I make payments using my preferred method?
items.answer: Yes, we support a wide range of payment methods, including popular fiat options like Credit Cards as well as various cryptocurrencies. This enables you to make payments using the method that is most convenient for you.

items.question: Is it safe to make payments?
items.answer: Yes, we take security very seriously. We use advanced fraud prevention measures to protect against fraudulent transactions and we securely store all payment information.

items.question: How do I make a purchase?
items.answer: Making a purchase is easy. Simply browse the available products and add the ones you wish to purchase to your cart. When you are ready to checkout, you will be prompted to enter your payment information and complete the transaction.

The return policy for purchases will vary depending on the specific product being purchased. It is important to review the return policy for each product before making a purchase to ensure that you understand the terms and conditions.
items.question: What is the return policy for purchases?

trust.feedbackScoreText: The feedback score helps customers understand whether or not this business has had positive feedback recently, meaning that every customer purchased a valid good.
trust.feedbackText: The feedback appeal ratio takes into consideration the total amount of feedback a merchant has and how many have been appealed (either removed or contested). The appeal ratio has a value between 0.00 and 1, where 0.10 corresponds to 10% of all feedback appealed.
trust.help: What is Trusted Advisor and what does this mean for customers?

identityText.no: This business has not verified its identity and details to Sellix. We cannot confirm this store is a valid and unique merchant.
identityText.yes: This business has verified its identity and details to Sellix. Verified businesses have gone through an address and document validation phase which confirms their identity and the uniqueness of the merchant.

paypalAccepted.no: PayPal or Credit/Debit cards not accepted

paypalText: This merchant does not accept any payment method with consumer protection. For example, Cryptocurrencies and Cash App cannot accept refunds due to their nature. Proceed with caution and be sure that you know what you're buying.

This merchant accepts payment methods, such as PayPal and Credit/Debit Cards, with consumer protection; meaning that a refund request can be executed when paying through them only if the purchased good is not valid. However, this does not mean that refund requests are available for payment methods like Cash App and Cryptocurrencies as they are not accepted due to their nature.
trust.salesText: This metric takes into consideration the quantity of sales this business had in the last 14 days. High and Medium sales mean that the business has been proactively selling goods with at least one order daily.
trust.title: Trusted Advisor

InvoiceCheckout.The invoice's crypto address has been se: The invoice's crypto address has been set as available ({{parentheses_0}}).
InvoiceCheckout.After you've sent the amount, click the: After you've sent the amount, click the button below.
InvoiceCheckout.Due to security reasons, your product ha: Due to security reasons, your product has been delivered to your email linked with the PayPal account you have used to complete the purchase. This is done to avoid fraud attempts.
InvoiceCheckout.The feedback cannot be longer than 256 c: The feedback cannot be longer than 256 characters
InvoiceCheckout.Go to the Customer Billing Portal: Go to the Customer Billing Portal
InvoiceCheckout.If you have any issue, please refer dire: If you have any issue, please refer directly to {{productTitle}}'s support.
InvoiceCheckout.Leave a text for your feedback: Leave a text for your feedback
InvoiceCheckout.Merchant must now accept your Cash App t: Merchant must now accept your Cash App transaction
InvoiceCheckout.Once it reaches the required confirmatio: Once it reaches the required confirmations, the product you bought will be shipped to your email.
InvoiceCheckout.Once this action has been processed, you: Once this action has been processed, you will automatically receive an email with the product you bought.
InvoiceCheckout.Once your payment is completed and this: Once your payment is completed and this invoice flagged as paid, you will be redirected back to {{productTitle}}'s site.
InvoiceCheckout.PayPal has reversed this transaction. Yo: PayPal has reversed this transaction. Your payment has been refunded, and the associated invoice has been canceled. Please verify the reimbursement in your PayPal account. If you have any questions or require further assistance, don't hesitate to contact us.
InvoiceCheckout.Scan the QR code or copy and paste the p: Scan the QR code or copy and paste the payment details into your wallet.
InvoiceCheckout.Scan the QR code through Cash App or cop: Scan the QR code through Cash App or copy and paste the seller's cashtag. When sending the amount, fill in the note field
InvoiceCheckout.Scan the QRCode with your Binance app to: Scan the QRCode with your Binance app to proceed with the payment.
InvoiceCheckout.Send crypto payments with 0% transaction: Send crypto payments with 0% transaction fees by
InvoiceCheckout.Sending the funds through a different ch: Sending the funds through a different chain other than the {{chain}} will result in your funds being permanently lost.
InvoiceCheckout.The invoice has been created ({{parenthe: The invoice has been created ({{parentheses_0}}) and we are now waiting to receive a payment.
InvoiceCheckout.The invoice has been created and we are: The invoice has been created and we are now waiting for the customer to select a gateway.
InvoiceCheckout.The invoice has been created using a 100: The invoice has been created using a 100% discount coupon, no further action is required.
InvoiceCheckout.The invoice has been flagged as complete: The invoice has been flagged as completed and the product has been shipped.
The invoice has been flagged as completed and the product has been shipped. Manually processed by the merchant.
InvoiceCheckout.The invoice has been manually processed: The invoice has been manually processed by the Sellix Support Team and is now flagged as COMPLETED.
InvoiceCheckout.The invoice has been updated ({{parenthe: The invoice has been updated ({{parentheses_0}}), we are waiting for a transaction through the new payment method.
InvoiceCheckout.The invoice has been voided due to every: The invoice has been voided due to every product being out of stock.
InvoiceCheckout.The invoice has been voided due to the p: The invoice has been voided due to the product being out of stock.
InvoiceCheckout.The invoice has been voided: we have not: The invoice has been voided: we have not received a payment within the time limit (SUB-C).
The invoice has been voided: we have not received a payment within the time limit (SUB-P).
InvoiceCheckout.The invoice is currently being processed: The invoice is currently being processed, this might take up to 5 minutes. Bear with us for a while whilst we get your digital good ASAP!
InvoiceCheckout.The merchant must now accept your: The merchant must now accept your
InvoiceCheckout.The subscription invoice has been create: The subscription invoice has been created and we are now waiting to receive a payment.
InvoiceCheckout.The transaction has been refunded. Your: The transaction has been refunded. Your payment has been returned, and the associated invoice has been canceled. Please check your account to confirm the reimbursement, which will happen within 14 days. If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to contact us.
InvoiceCheckout.This action may require a few hours, you: This action may require a few hours, you can close this page.
InvoiceCheckout.This invoice has been voided due to not: This invoice has been voided due to not receiving a payments within the 24 hours specified.
InvoiceCheckout.This invoice has been voided. This may b: This invoice has been voided. This may be due to an unexpected change in payment processing or the expiration of the allotted time. Please review your transaction history and contact us if you require further assistance.
InvoiceCheckout.This invoice is currently under a disput: This invoice is currently under a dispute from the customer.
InvoiceCheckout.This product has no service text, please: This product has no service text, please wait further actions by the seller or open a ticket on his page.
InvoiceCheckout.Tracking is not available for old invoic: Tracking is not available for old invoices.
InvoiceCheckout.Transactions sent to other chains will n: Transactions sent to other chains will not be detected and will result in a loss of crypto.
InvoiceCheckout.Was the product good? Write your feedbac: Was the product good? Write your feedback about it here.
InvoiceCheckout.We haven't received the full amount: We haven't received the full amount
InvoiceCheckout.We only support crypto transactions thro: We only support crypto transactions through the
InvoiceCheckout.We were not able to get you a new serial: We were not able to get you a new serial, please get in touch with the business.
InvoiceCheckout.We will send a confirmation email to you: We will send a confirmation email to your address and you will be redirected to the seller's website
InvoiceCheckout.You are purchasing a service by {{produc: You are purchasing a service by {{productTitle}}.
InvoiceCheckout.You can find the identifier by looking a: You can find the identifier by looking at the email Cash App has sent you. Check for a code similar to this
InvoiceCheckout.You will receive the product within minu: You will receive the product within minutes, check your email!
InvoiceCheckout.Your invoice has been paid. A confirmati: Your invoice has been paid. A confirmation email will be delivered to you shortly.
InvoiceCheckout.Your purchase has been completed. Your s: Your purchase has been completed. Your subscription has been added to your account automatically.
InvoiceCheckout.Your purchase has succeeded, you will be: Your purchase has succeeded, you will be redirected to
InvoiceCheckout.Your subscription is now active. You wil: Your subscription is now active. You will receive an email with the confirmation of your purchase and a receipt soon. You can also access customer billing portal to manage the active subscriptions in your name.
InvoiceCheckout.{{name}} has been received but it's not: {{name}} has been received but it's not enough. We only received {{receivedMessage}}, please send the remaining amount in order to fulfill the invoice
InvoiceCheckout.Leave a positive review to get: Leave a positive review to get
